LanguageData.AYAbsinthe.label: Absinthe
LanguageData.AYAbsinthe.description: Absinthe is historically described as a distilled, highly alcoholic beverage. It is an anise-flavoured spirit derived from botanicals, including the flowers and leaves of Artemisia absinthium (Wormwood), sometimes together with medicinal and culinary herbs.
LanguageData.AYAbsinthe.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.AYAbsinthe.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.AYAbsintheMash.label: Absinthe Mash
LanguageData.AYAbsintheMash.description: Un-fermented asbsinthe materials. This substance needs to ferment.
